title: betincryptoorg
author: betincryptoorg
content: Hello everyone, I would like to provide information about a new project in the field of crypto betting and online casinos. Our website is focused on betting companies sites and online casinos that accept payments in cryptocurrency. The website adress is https://betincrypto.org, where you can use a convenient filter on the main page and find out substantive information about the strengths and weaknesses of the most prominent companies in this market.The cryptocurrency bookmakers presented on the website are ranked according to many comparative parameters, with the maximum rating being 5.0, but most platforms receive scores up to hundredths of an integer value. I believe this is evidence that the rating in this project is being compiled scrupulously, which does not allow for unambiguous scoring.Besides, you can filter BTC BTC bookmaker websites by functions, parameters, and supported wallets. In the menu on the left, you can also apply a filter of bookies by sports disciplines and esports betting. There is also an option to filter companies that support a particular cryptocurrency, which significantly saves users' time when searching for the right sports betting or gambling platform.Anonymity is an important aspect of the gambling network in 2023, and this topic is also paid a lot of attention on the resource I offer you for review. I consider this information to be quite valuable for me personally, so I couldn't help but share it with you.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Welcome to the forum OP. Glad to see another crypto casino review site. The problem is that, there are already many big review sites present who provides anonymous and unbiased reviews. So why a gambler will refer to your review site for a casino’s review? Just make sure that you are unique in providing details of the casinos. I don’t know what type of visitors you will get at first, but still best of luck for the future. Do you also accept casino listings at your review site?

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Thank you for placing Stake in the number one spot on your casino review site, they deserve to be in the top spot they are one of the industry giants and have done a lot of innovation in the gambling industry, they have taken part in all big events in the sporting world, I think the cons are ignorable as long as their strong points are acceptable by gamblers.There are a lot of good casinos here in this forum please do check them all new and old ones so gamblers will have an insight on what casinos are worth adding to their list.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: I notice that fairspin is the only casino that doesn’t have any review yet it still received a 4.7ish rating despite no info available. You should display your criteria for scoring to be fair on all the casino listed in there.I saw many sportsbook listing like this but you guys always failed to provide the most important feature which is odds comparison to determine the perfect bookie that offer higher odds against other casino. The UI/UX design is smooth and very nice to read all the info written in there. Just make the scoring detailed and not just a the typical comment.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Each casino rating site must have its own parameters that are different from other casinos. So I wouldn't be surprised if your list of casinos could differ from other casino rating sites. The important thing is that in creating a casino review site, you need to be honest with the visitors who visit your review site so they can know what your benchmark is in determining whether the casino site is good or bad to use. And you can also give bonuses to those who want to register at certain casinos through your affiliate link so that they feel there is an award for those who want to register.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: sites like these are already flooded in the market so it is necessary that you create something different like for example you could mention how much money you put in the casino and how much money you have withdrawn from the casino and when was the last time you were paid, so you have to update this datathis will make people see that casino X that is on your website pays you frequently so these people will be able to trust casino X, this would be something that would be in your casino but that is not in other casinos, of course you will have to have good reputation for people to believe in you and for that if you show proof of payment it would be an advantage to get long term reputation

comments.author: betincryptoorg
comments.created_time: January 25, 2023, 04:38:08 PMLast edit: January 27, 2023, 05:41:28 PM by mprep

The problem is that, there are already many big review sites present who provides anonymous and unbiased reviews. So why a gambler will refer to your review site for a casino’s review? Thanks for the advice. Our list will be updated.Quote from: Eternad on January 25, 2023, 03:30:16 PMI notice that fairspin is the only casino that doesn’t have any review yet it still received a 4.7ish rating despite no info available. You should display your criteria for scoring to be fair on all the casino listed in there.I saw many sportsbook listing like this but you guys always failed to provide the most important feature which is odds comparison to determine the perfect bookie that offer higher odds against other casino. The UI/UX design is smooth and very nice to read all the info written in there. Just make the scoring detailed and not just a the typical comment.Thanks for your attention. Construction of website into the final stages, so there can be technical flaws.We removed fairspin from the rating.Quote from: Slow death on January 25, 2023, 04:13:00 PMsites like these are already flooded in the market so it is necessary that you create something different like for example you could mention how much money you put in the casino and how much money you have withdrawn from the casino and when was the last time you were paid, so you have to update this datathis will make people see that casino X that is on your website pays you frequently so these people will be able to trust casino X, this would be something that would be in your casino but that is not in other casinos, of course you will have to have good reputation for people to believe in you and for that if you show proof of payment it would be an advantage to get long term reputationQuote from: ethereumhunter on January 25, 2023, 04:07:16 PMEach casino rating site must have its own parameters that are different from other casinos. So I wouldn't be surprised if your list of casinos could differ from other casino rating sites. The important thing is that in creating a casino review site, you need to be honest with the visitors who visit your review site so they can know what your benchmark is in determining whether the casino site is good or bad to use. And you can also give bonuses to those who want to register at certain casinos through your affiliate link so that they feel there is an award for those who want to register.We truly value your feedback. your suggestions is worthwhile and we hope to be able to implement them in our next project.[moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Welcome to the forum op. Hope you enjoy being here and sharing your casino reviews and more. I'm sure you know that there are other websites reviews like this with different criteria and such. Anyway, can you share it with us on what or how is your review are given depends on the casino that you are going to review. This is a bit good news for me which I have more review site to use to compare it from other review sites and it is also what I use to know if the review is biased or not.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: hi welcome to the forum and i hope you enjoy here to keep updating whatever you write here.I just opened the crypto casino review site that you created and I see your site is simple and good, very easy to understand or explored by novice gamblers to find the best reviews about crypto casinos.and here are very many online casinos that are very good and have a lot of good reputations and maybe you need to do some research to add these casinos to your review site.good luck mate

And you can also give bonuses to those who want to register at certain casinos through your affiliate link so that they feel there is an award for those who want to register.We truly value your feedback. your suggestions is worthwhile and we hope to be able to implement them in our next project.How about making the review site interactive like allowing users to comment and vote up or down affecting their ratings?I don't own a casino review site though so I'm not sure what it will do but it may really make people come to vote for thier favorite casinos or casinos will hire users to vote. The comment section will really be a war.

comments.author: lesliegray
comments.body: I'm not recommending Mystake. Been there and they gave me hell. Took me months to get out my funds since they limited my withdrawals to 500$ per week even though it says 7000$ per week in their T&C.Stay away if you are a serious player.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: lesliegray on January 25, 2023, 07:19:17 PMI'm not recommending Mystake. Been there and they gave me hell. Took me months to get out my funds since they limited my withdrawals to 500$ per week even though it says 7000$ per week in their T&C.Stay away if you are a serious player.Hope everyone can read your feedback about this casino and the OP should consider your review on this site.Though this site is not very common from this forum, but your statement may help others to avoid being screwed by this casino. Anyway, betcrypto can roam around this board itself and they may add more casinos and bookies on their list. This forum is actually a good start adding existing crypto gambling sites, at least read the thread to get insights on how these sites operate.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: betincryptoorg on January 25, 2023, 01:43:07 PMHello everyone, I would like to provide information about a new project in the field of crypto betting and online casinos. Your website is looking good but I noticed many good crypto gambling websites are missing, so what is procedure for you to add them?If you can add more websites based on recommendations from customers than I would say that you add LiveCasino.I am not sure how you are rating all casinos but for me Cloudbet and BC.Game can't be rated higher than Sportsbet.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Visiting your website looks pretty good but there aren't many gambling sites that already exist on your website and most of them already have an announcement thread on this forum so we are on average familiar with them, curious to know how you give this rating whether it's based on personal experience with playing and use real money because by doing this the review will be more objective because it is based on experience

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Welcome to forum,I've check your site but I think you're giving misleading information about anonymous betting and anonymous casino, you include Cloudbet, bc.game and Bitcasino.io in this section, but those casinos have mandatory rule about identity verification in their terms of service.It might possible to gamble on those casinos without completing identity verification, but there's no guarantee they wouldn't ask it in the future or when you win big amount.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, all gamblers are of course happy with review sites like this because of course, especially a beginner who wants to play casino, they are usually looking for the best and safest and most trusted, so they can visit your site, but it's a good idea to become a copper member so you can make promotion design also in this thread using better images to get visitor traffic from this forum

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Welcome to the forum and I start to see that there's a demand for these reviews website and a way to get more referrals. However, it's not really the key on it but to inform other gamblers on what the author personally think of those casinos that are on their list.The thing here when a reviews website is becoming known, the importance and reputation of the author is where the readers will take their trust with. And it's a very important factor to be trusted by your readers by giving truthful and real reviews and not just because you're paid to do so.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: piebeyb on January 27, 2023, 08:09:30 AMWelcome to the forum, all gamblers are of course happy with review sites like this because of course, especially a beginner who wants to play casino, they are usually looking for the best and safest and most trusted, so they can visit your site, but it's a good idea to become a copper member so you can make promotion design also in this thread using better images to get visitor traffic from this forum  I guess any active newbie on this forum who want to review a site that have it presence here in the forum, it is easy to point out a few number of casinos that offers good services and have build their presence here in the forum. - Cassino rating site and review are not the most reliable to make a choice on, but looking at thos services in ops I can say their reviews are quite accurate using my own personal parameters and checking the forum rating of casinos that score 4.6+ and above rating score.
